pullRequests.title: Add CSV export functionality for user data
pullRequests.body: Implemented comprehensive CSV export feature that allows users to export their data in CSV format. Includes all user fields, proper formatting, and handles large datasets efficiently.
pullRequests.author: alice-dev

pullRequests.title: Fix memory leak in report generation
pullRequests.body: Fixed critical memory leak that occurred when generating large reports. The issue was caused by improper cleanup of temporary objects. Memory usage reduced by 60% for large reports.
pullRequests.author: bob-eng

pullRequests.title: Implement rate limiting on API endpoints
pullRequests.body: Added rate limiting middleware to prevent API abuse. Configured limits: 100 requests per hour per user, 10 requests per minute. Includes proper error messages and retry-after headers.
pullRequests.author: charlie-security

pullRequests.title: Optimize database queries for dashboard
pullRequests.body: Refactored dashboard queries to use proper indexing and reduce N+1 queries. Added query caching for frequently accessed data. Dashboard load time reduced from 3s to 0.5s.
pullRequests.author: diana-backend

pullRequests.title: Update dependencies to latest versions
pullRequests.body: Updated all npm dependencies to their latest stable versions. Includes security patches for 3 vulnerabilities. All tests passing after updates.
pullRequests.author: eve-devops

pullRequests.title: Add dark mode support
pullRequests.body: Implemented system-wide dark mode with automatic detection of user's OS preference. Users can also manually toggle between light and dark themes. All components updated with proper color schemes.
pullRequests.author: frank-frontend

pullRequests.title: Fix crash on user deletion
pullRequests.body: Resolved critical crash that occurred when deleting users with active sessions. Added proper session cleanup and cascade delete handling. Includes comprehensive tests.
pullRequests.author: grace-backend

pullRequests.title: Add two-factor authentication
pullRequests.body: Implemented TOTP-based two-factor authentication for enhanced account security. Supports authenticator apps like Google Authenticator and Authy. Includes backup codes for account recovery.
pullRequests.author: henry-security

linkedIssues.title: Need ability to export user data
Application crashes when generating large reports
High memory usage in report module
Dashboard is very slow to load
